name: GoodAction
description: GoodAction offers an AI-powered platform that helps corporations and nonprofits track, measure, and report social responsibility initiatives. It solves the problem of aligning CSR/ESG efforts with SDGs, simplifies complex reporting, and enhances stakeholder engagement. The platform provides precise impact metrics, clear reports, and tools for boosting participation, making social initiatives more transparent, efficient, and impactful.
one_liner: GoodAction offers an AI-powered platform that helps corporations and nonprofits track, measure, and report social responsibility initiatives. It solves the problem of aligning CSR/ESG efforts with SDGs, simplifies complex reporting, and enhances stakeholder engagement. The platform provides precise impact metrics, clear reports, and tools for boosting participation, making social initiatives more transparent, efficient, and impactful.
